http_client 3mp Metaproxy Module
http_client Metaproxy HTTP File Server Module
DESCRIPTION
This module implements HTTP client functionality. By default, if proxy element is not given, it should be used as an explicit proxy (non-transparent mode). If proxy element is set, requests will be relayed to the proxy given (transparent mode for HTTP clients accessing this module).
SCHEMA
EXAMPLES
A typical configuration looks like this:
<filter type="http_client"> <proxy>localhost:9999</proxy> </filter>
